title: The Hawthorne's Mojito Recipe
full_text:
The Hawthorne's Mojito Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
2 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
Banks 5 Island Rum
1
ounce
simple syrup
1
ounce
fresh lime juice
1
dash
Angostura bitters
5
to
7
mint leaves
plus
1
large sprig
for garnish
8
oz
soda water
crushed ice
Directions
Combine rum, simple syrup, lime juice, bitters, and mint leaves in a cocktail shaker and fill with ice. Shake vigorously for 15 seconds.
Add 1 ounce soda water. Strain through a fine mesh tea strainer into a highball filled with crushed ice. Top up with more soda water and garnish with mint sprig. Serve.
Special equipment
cocktail shaker, tea strainer, highball glass
Rum
